description.narrative: The mastery of basic skills to be acquired by pupils is improved, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Education â€“ General, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Quality of Education learnings and coordination are strengthened.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The mastery of basic skills to be acquired by pupils is improved

description.narrative: To strengthen the participation of communities and contribute to the performance and good governance of schools and the education system, a set of tools was developed to improve the capacities of teaching staff around school projects, with support from UNICEF.This work was carried out through a dynamic partnership with the French Development Agency (AFD), in a desire for mutual commitment for the harmonization and complementarity of the various supports provided to the sector, and to contribute to their scaling up.As part of the COVID response, communities and parents of students benefited from an awareness-raising session on social distancing measures. | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:11/01/2022
